definition: item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: Finally, hardware and software of the electronic load is designed.
sentences.chinese: 最後，進行了電子負載的軟硬件設計和初步實驗。

sentences.english: Lamia azienda è principalmente impegnata in hardware e software per computer, come memoria, hard disk, e così via.
sentences.chinese: 我公司主要經營電腦軟硬件，如內存條，硬盤等。

sentences.english: In addition, the design method of hardware and software of micro energy lose heat meter are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 闡述了熱量表微功耗軟硬件設計思想及方法。

sentences.english: In addition, the work principle and design of soft-ware and hardware are expatiated.
sentences.chinese: 詳細介紹了系統的工作原理和軟硬件設計方案。

sentences.english: Previously, companies dictated what software and hardware were used for work purposes.
sentences.chinese: 以往，公司就能一手包辦定下工作所需軟硬件的功能。

sentences.english: In the enterprise hardware and software environment reflects strict quality standards.
sentences.chinese: 在企業的軟硬件環境中體現出嚴格的質量水準。

sentences.english: Coupled with the development of computer hardware and software has been the development of FEM programs.
sentences.chinese: 而有限元分析程序是與計算機軟硬件技術同步發展的。

sentences.english: Deployment diagram defines the system structure of software and hardware.
sentences.chinese: 部署圖定義系統中軟硬件的物理體系結構。

sentences.english: Hardware and software keyloggers are great threats which are very difficult to avoid.
sentences.chinese: 軟硬件的鍵盤記錄程序是非常難以避免的威脅。

sentences.english: Methods Investigate software and hardware of some army hospital manufacturing laboratory.
sentences.chinese: 方法凋研軍隊部分戰區醫院製劑室的軟硬件現狀。

sentences.english: We finished whole construction of platform system in the method of software and hardware co-design.
sentences.chinese: 系統採取軟硬件協同設計的方法完成整個平臺的構建。

sentences.english: Exert oneself optimizes the soft hardware environment that the project builds.
sentences.chinese: 着力優化項目建設的軟硬件環境。

sentences.english: The solution may involve consulting services and hardware and software products.
sentences.chinese: 解決方案可能會涉及諮詢服務和軟硬件產品。

sentences.english: The software, hardware and application are introduced about temperature survey system in grain depot.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了糧庫糧溫監測系統的軟硬件結構和應用情況。

sentences.english: This thesis probes into the software and hardware environment, the development aim, and the function demand.
sentences.chinese: 文章對開發的目標，功能要求，軟硬件環境進行探討。

sentences.english: This paper discusses the intelligent vote box of election system based on computer. The software and hardware design is given.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了智能票箱計算機選舉系統及其軟硬件設計。
